A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I specifically made an account on this site to comment on this movie and the reviews I see about this movie. The past week I see lots of 5 star ratings and that made me think. Why so much 5 star ratings? So i did some igging. What do all past week  5 star rating reviews have in common? they all subscribed to RT this month. So my gues is these are bots or payed people to write positive reviews. \n\nNow about the movie. Internet is full of stories how this movie broke the Star Wars franchise\, look it up.
